displayName: Halo Ops - Kingdom [2] - Requisitions, DataProviders, Certificates

timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery:
sum(increase(workload_googleapis_com:rpc_server_duration_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", rpc_method="ListRequisitions", 
container_name="v2alpha-public-api-server-container"}[${__interval}]))  or vector(0)

widget.title: ListRequisitions Occurrences - Failures by Error Code

timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery:
sum(increase(workload_googleapis_com:rpc_server_duration_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", rpc_method="ListRequisitions", rpc_grpc_status_code!="0",
container_name="v2alpha-public-api-server-container"}[${__interval}]))by (rpc_grpc_status_code) or vector(0)

(
    sum(increase(workload_googleapis_com:rpc_server_duration_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", rpc_method="ListRequisitions", rpc_grpc_status_code!="0",
    container_name="v2alpha-public-api-server-container"}[24h]) or vector(0))
)
/
(
    sum(increase(workload_googleapis_com:rpc_server_duration_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", rpc_method="ListRequisitions",
    container_name="v2alpha-public-api-server-container"}[24h]) or vector(0))
)
*100

    sum(increase(workload_googleapis_com:rpc_server_duration_count{monitored_resource="k8s_container", rpc_method="ListRequisitions", rpc_grpc_status_code!="0", container_name="v2alpha-public-api-server-container"}[24h]) or vector(0))
)
